name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub Pull requests Files Changed List

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that displays a file difference list for pull requests on GitHub

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔧 Features
📄 The difference file list is displayed automatically.
🔍 The list can be filtered.
📋 You can quickly copy the difference list.
